How do you open a program such as a Microsoft Word when there are no icons on the desktop?

choice.descriptionChoice: Right click to reveal all icons.
It is not possible to open program if no icons are on the desktop
Cick the start button and select program from the menu.

question.descriptionQuestion: How do you minimize or maximize a program in Windows?

choice.descriptionChoice: Go to "File" and select minimize or maximize
Top right corner, dash or square.
This function can not be done.

question.descriptionQuestion: How do you close a window on your desktop?

choice.descriptionChoice: Press the "Ctrl" key on the keyboard
Use the mouse to press the button with the "X" in it at the top right corner of the screen
Use the mouse to press the button with the _ in it at the top right corner of the screen

choice.descriptionChoice: Depends on what type of file.
